person.persName: John L. Davidson (Todd County, Kentucky, contractor)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, contractor. Kentucky native. Contractor in Todd County in 1860. Major in the 26th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from March 1862 to April 1862. Died at Battle of Shiloh in Tennessee on April 7, 1862.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 71.
